name: CodeMirror Code / Text pane style
description: Change the background color, font and font color of text / code document contents.
additional_info: This style was created for fun, but if modified properly can be a serious style to use either as part of a dark colors UI or to help ease your eyes while reading lines and lines of code. Style was created using a text file, which means any format-specific content hasn't been modified, and will affect global colors of everything that displays text. 04/17/15 userstyles.org now uses CodeMirror! So this style has been made to also work with userstyles.org.
